lines:
be credited to my sons account 
and I hope you will kendly 
acknowledge receipt of some

I have just returned 
from a trip to Europe, and the 
delayed my remillance! I 
hope to see you some three on 
four months prom hence in 
Generica will the Chinese 
Naval Commissioner. The 
interest | America to our chun 
Government is getting more 
important so I hope to join 
hands will you soon.

Dear sir Yourstruck

K. Kwan.
raw: be credited to my sons account and I hope you will kendly acknowledge receipt of some I have just returned from a trip to Europe, and the delayed my remillance! I hope to see you some three on four months prom hence in Generica will the Chinese Naval Commissioner. The interest | America to our chun Government is getting more important so I hope to join hands will you soon. Dear sir Yourstruck K. Kwan.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter thanking Stearns for the statements of account for his son. He encloses $600 to apply to the account and apologizes for the delay, due to his travel in Europe. Kwan hopes to see Stearns when he comes to the U.S. for a meeting with the Chinese Naval Commissioners.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
